question: 歌手
sourceMnemonic: Remember how  <ja>手</ja> can sometimes mean “doer”? What do you think a <kanji>song</kanji> <kanji>doer</kanji> is? A <vocabulary>singer</vocabulary>, of course
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are on'yomi readings. You've learned them both already (you learned <ja>手</ja>'s on'yomi reading with word <ja>投手</ja>), so you should be able to read this like a <vocabulary>singer</vocabulary> sings with a bunch of <reading>cashew</reading>s <ja>かしゅ</ja> in their mouth. FAST AND LOUD!
